availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gideon G. Snyder (Hancock County; guerilla; prisoner of war at Camp Morton)

body.p: Lived in Hancock County in 1860 with his parents--James W. and Sarah I. Snyder. His father listed as a tobacconist. Listed as a private, guerrilla, and prisoner of war at Camp Morton, Indiana on an undated roll.

bibl.p: Gideon G. Snider, Guerilla, Compiled Service Record, (https://www.fold3.com/image/257324706), (accessed March 30, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 26.
